certificateOfRegister.info: To download the document, click on the paperclip icon or the 'Download file' button. jpg, jpeg, png or pdf format. The maximum size is 5 MB.

email.info: This email address will be your login. You will receive a letter to the specified email address regarding the results of processing your registration request.

socialNetworks.info: Add links to social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Youtube, etc.).
